QuestData.Title: Dragons are the Least of Our Problems
QuestData.Description: That dragon waking up riled up a host of other nasty creatures in these mines. Two types are proving to be a thorn in the side of the Dragonmaw: Nethermine flayers and Nethermine ravagers. You must help us by killing them off. All I ask is your involvement once per day.$B$BGet in there and kill as many as you can!
QuestData.LogDescription: The Dragonmaw Foreman at the Netherwing Mines in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to kill 15 Nethermine Flayers and 5 Nethermine Ravagers.
QuestData.CompletionText: How's that flayer infestation problem coming along?
QuestData.RewardText: That'll be enough for today, overseer. Come back tomorrow for another round of clean up.
